dcterms:title: Risko: Integrity Risk Vocabulary v1.2
dcterms:description: Risko v1.2: A vocabulary for modelling organisational integrity, country/sector/political risk, counterparties, controls, incidents, investigations, enforcement actions, and scenario-based overrides. This version standardises risk ratings on a 1–5 scale (1 = Very Low, 5 = Very High).
dcterms:creator: YOUR_ORG_NAME

@graph.rdfs:label: Risko Entity
@graph.rdfs:comment: Base class for all integrity-risk-related resources.

@graph.rdfs:label: Organization
@graph.rdfs:comment: An organization whose integrity risk position is being assessed.

@graph.rdfs:label: Organizational Unit
@graph.rdfs:comment: A business unit or subsidiary within an integrity-scoped organization.

@graph.rdfs:label: Counterparty
@graph.rdfs:comment: Any external party (supplier, agent, distributor, JV partner, service provider) that can carry integrity risk.

@graph.rdfs:label: Person
@graph.rdfs:comment: A natural person relevant to the integrity risk position (employee, director, owner, official).

@graph.rdfs:label: Politically Exposed Person
@graph.rdfs:comment: A person holding or having held a prominent public function and treated as a politically exposed person.

@graph.rdfs:label: Role
@graph.rdfs:comment: A role played by a person in an organization or counterparty that is relevant for integrity risk.

@graph.rdfs:label: Jurisdiction
@graph.rdfs:comment: A country or administrative area with a distinct legal and political regime.

@graph.rdfs:label: Sector
@graph.rdfs:comment: An industry or sector classification relevant for integrity risk analysis.

@graph.rdfs:label: Location
@graph.rdfs:comment: A physical location such as a site, office, plant, or project location.

@graph.rdfs:label: Time Period
@graph.rdfs:comment: A bounded time period such as a fiscal year, quarter, or assessment window.

@graph.rdfs:label: Risk Dimension
@graph.rdfs:comment: A dimension of risk (e.g. corruption, sanctions, fraud, political violence) that can be measured.

@graph.rdfs:label: Risk Indicator
@graph.rdfs:comment: A measured indicator for a specific risk dimension, such as a score or rating.

@graph.rdfs:label: Risk Profile
@graph.rdfs:comment: A collection of risk indicators and ratings describing the risk position for a given context.

@graph.rdfs:label: Country Risk Profile
@graph.rdfs:comment: Risk profile for a specific jurisdiction (country or region).

@graph.rdfs:label: Sector Risk Profile
@graph.rdfs:comment: Risk profile for a specific sector, optionally in a given jurisdiction.

@graph.rdfs:label: Political Risk Profile
@graph.rdfs:comment: Risk profile capturing political risk at country, sector, organization, or counterparty level.

@graph.rdfs:label: Integrity Risk
@graph.rdfs:comment: A specific integrity risk such as bribery, fraud, sanctions, conflicts of interest, human rights, or data privacy.

@graph.rdfs:label: Risk Factor
@graph.rdfs:comment: A factor that drives or contributes to a specific integrity risk.

@graph.rdfs:label: Risk Score
@graph.rdfs:comment: A numeric or categorical score assigned to a risk using the canonical 1–5 scale (1 = Very Low, 5 = Very High).

@graph.rdfs:label: Risk Assessment
@graph.rdfs:comment: An assessment of integrity risks for a given organization, unit, or counterparty.

@graph.rdfs:label: Integrity Policy
@graph.rdfs:comment: A policy addressing one or more integrity risk categories (e.g. anti-bribery, sanctions, fraud).

@graph.rdfs:label: Integrity Control
@graph.rdfs:comment: A specific control designed to prevent, detect, or correct integrity risks.

@graph.rdfs:label: Assurance Activity
@graph.rdfs:comment: An internal or external assurance activity such as an audit, review, or certification.

@graph.rdfs:label: Integrity Incident
@graph.rdfs:comment: An alleged or confirmed integrity breach such as bribery, fraud, misreporting, harassment, or sanctions violation.

@graph.rdfs:label: Whistleblowing Report
@graph.rdfs:comment: A report raising concerns about suspected integrity issues.

@graph.rdfs:label: Investigation
@graph.rdfs:comment: A forensic or compliance investigation into one or more incidents.

@graph.rdfs:label: Corrective Action
@graph.rdfs:comment: A remediation or improvement action taken in response to identified integrity issues.

@graph.rdfs:label: Enforcement Action
@graph.rdfs:comment: An action by a regulator, prosecutor, or court in response to integrity breaches (fine, settlement, debarment, etc.).

@graph.rdfs:label: Evidence Item
@graph.rdfs:comment: A document or artefact used as evidence in risk assessments, incidents, or investigations.

@graph.rdfs:label: Risk Data Source
@graph.rdfs:comment: A source of risk-relevant data such as external ratings, internal models, or regulator data.

@graph.rdfs:label: Scenario
@graph.rdfs:comment: A specific contextual situation (country, sector, time, trigger) in which risk and control behaviour may differ.

@graph.rdfs:label: Scenario Override
@graph.rdfs:comment: An override that adjusts risk profiles, risks, policies or controls when a given scenario applies.

@graph.rdfs:label: Risko 1–5 Risk Rating Scale
@graph.rdfs:comment: Canonical risk rating scale for Risko: 1 = Very Low, 2 = Low, 3 = Moderate, 4 = High, 5 = Very High.

@graph.rdfs:label: Identifier
@graph.rdfs:comment: Local identifier for the resource.

@graph.rdfs:label: External ID
@graph.rdfs:comment: Identifier from an external system (GRC tool, ERP, case system).

@graph.rdfs:label: Status
@graph.rdfs:comment: Lifecycle status of the resource (Active, Inactive, Draft, Closed, etc.).

@graph.rdfs:label: Created At
@graph.rdfs:comment: Creation timestamp.

@graph.rdfs:label: Updated At
@graph.rdfs:comment: Last update timestamp.

@graph.rdfs:label: has organizational unit
@graph.rdfs:comment: Links an organization to a subordinate organizational unit.

@graph.rdfs:label: part of organization
@graph.rdfs:comment: Indicates that an organizational unit is part of an organization.

@graph.rdfs:label: operates in jurisdiction
@graph.rdfs:comment: Jurisdictions in which the organization operates.

@graph.rdfs:label: active in sector
@graph.rdfs:comment: Sectors in which the organization is active.

@graph.rdfs:label: has counterparty
@graph.rdfs:comment: Counterparties associated with the organization.

@graph.rdfs:label: counterparty of
@graph.rdfs:comment: Organization for which this entity acts as a counterparty.

@graph.rdfs:label: counterparty type
@graph.rdfs:comment: Type of counterparty (Supplier, Agent, Distributor, JV Partner, Service Provider).

@graph.rdfs:label: located in jurisdiction
@graph.rdfs:comment: Jurisdiction in which the counterparty is located.

@graph.rdfs:label: has role
@graph.rdfs:comment: Roles held by this person.

@graph.rdfs:label: role holder
@graph.rdfs:comment: Person holding this role.

@graph.rdfs:label: role in organization
@graph.rdfs:comment: Organization in which this role is held.

@graph.rdfs:label: role type
@graph.rdfs:comment: Role type label (e.g. BoardMember, CountryManager, ThirdPartyAgent).

@graph.rdfs:label: is PEP
@graph.rdfs:comment: Boolean flag indicating whether the person is considered a politically exposed person.

@graph.rdfs:label: ISO country code
@graph.rdfs:comment: ISO 3166 country code for a jurisdiction.

@graph.rdfs:label: has country risk profile
@graph.rdfs:comment: Country risk profiles defined for this jurisdiction.

@graph.rdfs:label: has sector risk profile
@graph.rdfs:comment: Sector risk profiles defined for this sector.

@graph.rdfs:label: dimension code
@graph.rdfs:comment: Code identifying the risk dimension.

@graph.rdfs:label: for dimension
@graph.rdfs:comment: Dimension that this risk indicator measures.

@graph.rdfs:label: indicator value
@graph.rdfs:comment: Value of a risk indicator (numeric or categorical encoded as string).

@graph.rdfs:label: scale
@graph.rdfs:comment: Description of the indicator scale (e.g. 0–100, 1–5, Low/Medium/High).

@graph.rdfs:label: overall risk rating
@graph.rdfs:comment: Overall risk rating label (Very Low, Low, Moderate, High, Very High).

@graph.rdfs:label: overall risk score
@graph.rdfs:comment: Overall risk score using the canonical 1–5 scale (1 = Very Low, 5 = Very High).

@graph.rdfs:label: has risk indicator
@graph.rdfs:comment: Risk indicators contributing to this risk profile.

@graph.rdfs:label: for jurisdiction
@graph.rdfs:comment: Jurisdiction for which this country risk profile is defined.

@graph.rdfs:label: for sector
@graph.rdfs:comment: Sector for which this sector risk profile is defined.

@graph.rdfs:label: risk category
@graph.rdfs:comment: High-level risk category (Bribery, Fraud, Sanctions, etc.).

@graph.rdfs:label: risk description
@graph.rdfs:comment: Description of the risk.

@graph.rdfs:label: has risk factor
@graph.rdfs:comment: Risk factors contributing to this risk.

@graph.rdfs:label: has risk score
@graph.rdfs:comment: Risk scores assigned to this risk.

@graph.rdfs:label: score value
@graph.rdfs:comment: Numeric score on the canonical 1–5 scale (1 = Very Low, 5 = Very High).

@graph.rdfs:label: score label
@graph.rdfs:comment: Label for the score value (Very Low, Low, Moderate, High, Very High).

@graph.rdfs:label: uses rating concept
@graph.rdfs:comment: Optional link to the corresponding SKOS concept in the RiskRatingScale_1to5 scheme.

@graph.rdfs:label: assessed entity
@graph.rdfs:comment: Entity (organization, unit, counterparty) that this assessment covers.

@graph.rdfs:label: assessment date
@graph.rdfs:comment: Date of the risk assessment.

@graph.rdfs:label: policy type
@graph.rdfs:comment: Policy type (AntiBribery, Sanctions, ConflictsOfInterest, Fraud, etc.).

@graph.rdfs:label: covers risk category
@graph.rdfs:comment: Risk categories this policy addresses.

@graph.rdfs:label: control type
@graph.rdfs:comment: Control type (Preventive, Detective, Corrective).

@graph.rdfs:label: mitigates risk
@graph.rdfs:comment: Risks that this control helps to mitigate.

@graph.rdfs:label: incident type
@graph.rdfs:comment: Type of incident (AllegedBribery, Fraud, Misreporting, Harassment, etc.).

@graph.rdfs:label: incident date
@graph.rdfs:comment: Date on which the incident occurred or was first known.

@graph.rdfs:label: incident status
@graph.rdfs:comment: Status of the incident (Reported, UnderInvestigation, Substantiated, NotSubstantiated, Closed).

@graph.rdfs:label: investigates incident
@graph.rdfs:comment: Incident that this investigation relates to.

@graph.rdfs:label: investigation outcome
@graph.rdfs:comment: Outcome of the investigation (Substantiated, NotSubstantiated, etc.).

@graph.rdfs:label: enforcement authority
@graph.rdfs:comment: Regulator, prosecutor, or court that took this enforcement action.

@graph.rdfs:label: action type
@graph.rdfs:comment: Type of enforcement action (Fine, Settlement, Debarment, etc.).

@graph.rdfs:label: penalty amount
@graph.rdfs:comment: Monetary penalty amount associated with this enforcement action.

@graph.rdfs:label: evidence type
@graph.rdfs:comment: Type of evidence (Document, Email, LogExport, InterviewNote, MediaArticle, CourtDocument).

@graph.rdfs:label: source name
@graph.rdfs:comment: Name of the risk data source.

@graph.rdfs:label: scenario name
@graph.rdfs:comment: Human-readable name for the scenario.

@graph.rdfs:label: scenario description
@graph.rdfs:comment: Natural-language description of the scenario.

@graph.rdfs:label: scenario type
@graph.rdfs:comment: Type of scenario (MarketEntry, Crisis, ElectionCycle, PostEnforcement, HighGrowthPush, etc.).

@graph.rdfs:label: scenario jurisdiction
@graph.rdfs:comment: Jurisdictions to which the scenario applies.

@graph.rdfs:label: scenario sector
@graph.rdfs:comment: Sectors to which the scenario applies.

@graph.rdfs:label: scenario organization
@graph.rdfs:comment: Organizations to which the scenario applies.

@graph.rdfs:label: scenario time period
@graph.rdfs:comment: Time period during which the scenario applies.

@graph.rdfs:label: scenario trigger
@graph.rdfs:comment: Trigger event or condition for the scenario (election, conflict, major tender, etc.).

@graph.rdfs:label: for scenario
@graph.rdfs:comment: Scenario for which this override is defined.

@graph.rdfs:label: override target
@graph.rdfs:comment: Resource being overridden (risk profile, risk, policy, control, indicator).

@graph.rdfs:label: override type
@graph.rdfs:comment: Nature of the override (Tighten, Relax, AddControl, SuspendActivity, RequireEnhancedDueDiligence, etc.).

@graph.rdfs:label: override details
@graph.rdfs:comment: Natural-language description of what is being overridden and how.

@graph.rdfs:label: override effective from
@graph.rdfs:comment: Date on which this override becomes effective.

@graph.rdfs:label: override effective to
@graph.rdfs:comment: Date on which this override ceases to be effective.

@graph.rdfs:label: override priority
@graph.rdfs:comment: Priority used to resolve conflicts when multiple overrides apply.

@graph.rdfs:label: override justification
@graph.rdfs:comment: Rationale for the override (regulatory expectation, board mandate, risk committee decision, etc.).
